verses.verse: Now this is the history of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron:<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>

These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who were <S%H4886>anointed,<s%> whom he <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> to minister in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office.

<S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when they <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and they had no <S%H1121>children.<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> ministered in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> their <S%H1>father.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7126>"Bring<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H7126>near,<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that they may minister to <S%H8334>him.<s%>

They shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4931>requirements,<s%> and the <S%H4931>requirements<s%> of the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H5712>Meeting,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

They shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> all the <S%H3627>furnishings<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and the <S%H4931>obligations<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons.<s%> They are wholly <S%H5414>given<s%> to him on the behalf of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

You shall <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> their <S%H3550>priesthood.<s%> The <S%H2114>stranger<s%> who comes <S%H7131>near<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Behold,<s%> I have taken the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> instead of all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> who <S%H6363>open<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the Levites shall be <S%H3881>mine:<s%>

for all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> are <S%H3117>mine.<s%> On the day that I <S%H5221>struck<s%> down all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I made <S%H6942>holy<s%> to me all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal.<s%> They shall be <S%H3068>mine.<s%> I am Yahweh."
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6485>"Count<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families.<s%> You shall <S%H6485>count<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them according to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as he was <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>
These were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> by their <S%H8034>names:<s%> <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> and <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>
These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> by their <S%H4940>families:<s%> <S%H3845>Libni<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> by their <S%H4940>families:<s%> <S%H6019>Amram,<s%> and <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> by their <S%H4940>families:<s%> <S%H4249>Mahli<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi.<s%> These <S%H1992>are<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses.<s%>

Of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> was the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3846>Libnites,<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8097>Shimeites:<s%> these are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites.<s%>

Those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4557>them,<s%> according to the number of all the <S%H2145>males,<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> even those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
The <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> shall <S%H2583>encamp<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H3220>westward.<s%>
The <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> shall be <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3815>Lael.<s%>

The <S%H4931>duty<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> shall be the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> and the <S%H4908>tent,<s%> its <S%H168>covering,<s%> and the <S%H4372>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%>

and the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> and the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> which is by the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and its <S%H4340>cords<s%> for all of its <S%H5656>service.<s%>

Of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> was the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6020>Amramites,<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3325>Izharites,<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2276>Hebronites,<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5817>Uzzielites:<s%> these are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites.<s%>

According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of all the <S%H2145>males,<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> there were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> <S%H8104>keeping<s%> the <S%H4931>requirements<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
The <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> shall <S%H2583>encamp<s%> on the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

The <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> shall be <S%H469>Elizaphan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel.<s%>

Their <S%H4931>duty<s%> shall be the <S%H727>ark,<s%> the <S%H7979>table,<s%> the <S%H4501>lamp<s%> <S%H4196>stand,<s%> the altars, the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> with which they <S%H8334>minister,<s%> and the <S%H4539>screen,<s%> and all its <S%H5656>service.<s%>

<S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> with the <S%H6486>oversight<s%> of those who <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>requirements<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
Of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> was the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4250>Mahlites,<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4188>Mushites.<s%> These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>

Those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4557>them,<s%> according to the number of all the <S%H2145>males,<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

The <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> was <S%H6700>Zuriel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H32>Abihail.<s%> They shall <S%H2583>encamp<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

The <S%H6486>appointed<s%> <S%H4931>duty<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> shall be the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>'s <S%H7175>boards,<s%> its <S%H1280>bars,<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> its <S%H134>sockets,<s%> all its <S%H3627>instruments,<s%> all its <S%H5656>service,<s%>
the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H134>it,<s%> their sockets, their <S%H3489>pins,<s%> and their <S%H4340>cords.<s%>

Those who <S%H2583>encamp<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6924>eastward,<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H4908>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise,<s%> shall be <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H8104>keeping<s%> the <S%H4931>requirements<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> for the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> The <S%H2114>stranger<s%> who comes <S%H7131>near<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
All who were numbered of the Levites, whom Moses and Aaron numbered at the commandment of Yahweh, by their families, all the males from a month old and upward, were twenty - two thousand.

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6485>"Number<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> and <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of their <S%H8034>names.<s%>

You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> for <S%H3068>me<s%> (I am Yahweh) instead of all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H929>livestock<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> instead of all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> among the <S%H929>livestock<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H1060>him,<s%> all the firstborn among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

All the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> of those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H6242>them,<s%> were twenty - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> - three.
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> instead of all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H929>livestock<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> instead of their <S%H929>livestock;<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be <S%H3068>mine.<s%> I am Yahweh.

For the <S%H6302>redemption<s%> of the two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3967>seventy<s%> - three of <S%H1060>the<s%> firstborn of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H5736>exceed<s%> the <S%H5921>number<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%>

you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> apiece for each <S%H1538>one;<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8255>them<s%> (the shekel is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%>):
and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3701>money,<s%> with which their <S%H5736>remainder<s%> is <S%H6302>redeemed,<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6306>redemption<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> from those who <S%H5736>exceeded<s%> the number of those who were <S%H6302>redeemed<s%> by the <S%H3881>Levites;<s%>

from the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3701>money,<s%> one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the shekel of the <S%H6944>sanctuary:<s%>

and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H6302>redemption<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> according to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
